config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is related to getting the search string escape character from the database settings. It is used to escape special characters in search strings.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The getSearchStringEscape() method is triggered whenever a search operation is performed that requires escaping special characters.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is minimal on the system size as it simply retrieves a predefined escape character from the database settings.
